name: Cookie Baker
description:
Get in your very own kitchen, it's time to bake some cookies!

Mix many kinds of ingredients and bake according to the chef's recommended recipe book.

20 Different kinds of recipe!

Touch and drag the various ingredients into the mixing bowl.

Enjoy cracking eggs, mixing the dough using the spatula and more just by using your fingers!

After your dough is set, scoop them up and put them on the baking tray. Then take the tray and put them in the pre-heated oven and wait for it to bake in a few short seconds!

Once its done serve them to the waiting customer!

But watch the clock and don't let the time slip you by.
The faster you bake and serve your customers the happier they'll be and the higher your rewards.

If you like cooking and baking games such as Cooking Mama or Cake Doodle; you will enjoy playing Cookie Baker!

**Retina display supported!**
